The foundation was founded in 1992 by the late arts philanthropist Richard and Helen DeVos, who was a major supporter of the Los Angeles County Museum of Art (LACMA), which is now undergoing a $450 million expansion project completed in 2017. The gift is one of several investments made by the family in the wake of the Covid-19 pandemic.
